pageContext.description:
This representation of the subject of Lot and his Daughters from the Old Testament (Genesis 19, 23-38) shows the three protagonists as half-length figures positioned close to the picture plane. Lot is depicted at the centre in an affectionate embrace with one of his daughters. He is holding a large goblet, which is refilled by his other daughter who stands to his right. There is a rock behind them and beyond that on the right the flames of the burning city of Sodom are visible as well as the small white figure of Lot’s wife, turning to a pillar of salt.
[cda 2020]

tests.text:
Sample paint spots were anayliszed employing XRF and the following elements in the paint were detected:

Sample 1: yellow paint fro the goblet
Elements detected: Sn, Pb, Hg, Zn, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Sn, Pb: lead tin yellow; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing blue or green pigment; Fe, Mn: iron oxide or ochre; Ca: chalk or gypsum; Zn: retouching?

Sample 2: blue from Lot's cloak
Elements detected: Pb, Hg, Zn, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing blue pigment; Fe, Mn: iron oxide or ochre; Ca: chalk or gypsum; Zn: retouching?

Sample 3: white, hair on Lot's head
Elements detected: Ba, Pb, Hg, Zn, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing blue or green pigment; Fe, Mn: iron oxide or ochre; Ca: chalk or gypsum; Zn: retouching?

Sample 4: flesh paint from the (r.) daughter's cheek
Elements detected: Pb, Hg, Zn, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing blue or green pigment; Ca: chalk or gypsum; Zn: retouching?

Sample 5: white/flesh paint from the (r.) daughter's blouse
Elements detected: Ba, Pb, Hg, Zn, Cu, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing blue or green pigment; Ca: chalk or gypsum; Zn: retouching?

Sample 6: orange from the flames in the background
Elements detected: Ba, Sn, Pb, Hg, Zn, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Sn, Pb: lead tin yellow; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing blue or green pigment; Fe, Mn: iron oxide or ochre; Ca: chalk or gypsum; Zn: retouching?

Sample 7: dark red from the (r.) daughter's dress
Elements detected: Pb, Hg, Zn, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing blue or green pigment; Fe, Mn: iron oxide or ochre; Ca: chalk or gypsum; Zn: retouching? 

Sample 8: green from the (l.) daughter's sleeve
Elements detected: Sn, Pb, Hg,Cu, Fe, Mn, Ca
Interpretation: Pb: lead white; Sn, Pb: lead tin yellow; Hg: vermilion; Cu: copper containing gren pigment; Fe, Mn: iron oxide or ochre; Ca: chalk or gypsum

[see photo for location of samples]

Sample verso black coating
Elements detected: Pb, Zn, Fe, Ca

[Unpublished analysis results, Stephanie Dietz, 30.01.2018, CICS Cologne]
